title: Far Cry 1 ULTIMATE Edition v1.32
description:
*Follow these steps 4 ULTIMATE EXPERIENCE:


1) Mount and Install the game (FARCRY Disc 1...FARCRY Disc 5);

2) Install official patches from ,,Patches" Folder (far cry v1.1...far cry v1.32);

3) Install the SPECIAL patches from ,,Ultimate Ed. Patches" Folder as follows:

	1)Far Cry AMDx64 Upgrade PATCH v1.32
	2)Far Cry AMDx64 Exclusive Content Pack

4) Apply crack ONLY 4 the 32-bit version of the game from the folder ,,Far Cry v1.32 eng No-CD Fixed.EXE"
        (the 64-bit version works without one)

5) Play!


*****WARNING*****
  The game will freeze if wil select from the configurator (1st run) LIGHTNING-VERY HIGH!!!!
  In order 2 work, all you have 2 do is -> ALL on VERY HIGH exept LIGHTNING -HIGH!!!
